connected.notice: The withdrawal can only be made to your Mixin Messenger account, and your connected Mixin Messenger ID is %{mixin_id}.
connected.amount: Enter the amount of %{symbol} to withdrawal:

disconnected.notice: The Mixin Messenger connection is permanent, you can't disconnect it later.
disconnected.steps:
• To protect account security, withdrawal can only be made to a Mixin Messenger account.
  • Get Mixin Messenger from the only official donwload page https://mixin.one.
  • Find the the circle button at the bottom of the Mixin Messenger app, it's the QR code scanner.
  • Click the button below will redirect you to the Mixin Messenger website.
  • Scan the QR code with the Mixin Messenger QR code scanner.
  • Allow the access of Ocean ONE to your Mixin profile.
